news.description: Mirakl is redefining commerce through AI agents and ChatGPT Enterprise—achieving faster documentation, smarter customer support, and building toward agent-native commerce with Mirakl Nexus.

news.title: OpenAI and NORAD team up to bring new magic to “NORAD Tracks Santa”
